entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 24.

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then showers beginning before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low 14. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
